mng: to irrigate, to pour, to install (software), to record (music)

exm.mng: to pour into, perfusion (med.), to concentrate one's attention on, to teach, to inculcate, to instill
to imbue with, to inculcate, to instill into, to teach, to impart, to channel water to another place
lit. to irrigate, to artificially increase weight, to cook the books, to leave a tasteless message
grouting, (of grain) to be in the milk, to form a vesicle (medicine)
